title: 'The Hunger Games' Meets Ancient Rome in 'An Ember in the Ashes'
contentencoded: This week we're thinking about the much anticipated debut novel by Sabaa Tahir. Called "An Ember in the Ashes," it's an epicÂ fantasy set in a world reminiscent of ancient Rome. Sabaa Tahir tells Charles Monroe-Kane how her background as a newpaper editor influenced the book.
